alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 4:28PM EDT until April 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Bradford County in northern Florida... Southwestern Baker County in northeastern Florida... Union County in northern Florida... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palestine Community, or 7 miles northwest of Lake Butler, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Palestine Community, Groves, Beasley, New River, Ellerbee and Johnstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
